forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 7 to 12 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 53. West southwest wind 6 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds with a gentle warmth filtered through a partly sunny sky. Currently hovering around 61 degrees, the atmosphere will gradually cool, settling around 59 by this afternoon. The pleasant southwest breeze whispers softly through the streets, weaving the scents of sea salt and urban life into one serene tapestry. Though sunlit patches dance upon the rooftops, the day carries a subtle shroud, with the horizon hinting at a light marine layer that lingers just past the Golden Gate, merging land with sea in a soft embrace—a delicate veil that adds a touch of mystery without hiding the city's vibrant spirit.

As evening approaches, expect a transition into a mostly cloudy night, temperatures dipping towards a cozy 53. A light west-southwest wind will continue to rustle through the city, bringing with it the refreshing coolness that the fog often bestows. It’s a perfect time to engage in quiet wanderings through local parks, perhaps with a light sweater to ward off the briskness that the night may bring. As you stroll along the Embarcadero or peruse the quaint shops of North Beach, let the soft clouds above mirror the thoughts of your day—a comforting retreat wrapped in layers of comfort and the sound of waves lapping against the shore.
